author: Predeactor
A bit of everyone who helped
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not save data about users persistently.
short: Akinator will guess a real or fictitious character by answering questions.
description: Akinator, the genius, will read in your mind and guess who you are thinking of! Answer Akinator's questions and get impressed by his talent!
install_msg:
Thank for installing Akinator.
This cog is now outdated, hope you don't mind this decision of me but I really wanted to since it's been a problematic cog to me.
Check out Phen's Aki cog instead. Adding the fact that 2 approved cog creators have the same cog is a bit... useless.
